_source.short_desc: This all-in-one retail POS brings point-of-sale, eCommerce, and marketing tools together into one system.
_source.long_desc: Rain provides an all-in-one retail POS system with everything you need to sell online and in-store.  It includes  an integrated eCommerce website as well as automated marketing tools. Retailers using Rain give high marks to the seamless relationship between in-store POS and the website.  Rain's support ranks very high as well.  On average, Rain customers experience a 21% increase in year-over-year revenue after implementing it's software in their stores.
_source.target_audience: Rain specializes in niche retail markets including Music, Ski, Surf, Dive, Toy, Apparel, Quilt, Sewing, and Craft stores.  It simplifies business operations and helps increase total sales.

category_features.name: Asset Tracking
category_features.definition: Monitor assets (i.e. equipment, tools, software, hardware, etc.) lifecycle and usage from acquisition to retirement

category_features.name: Billing & Invoicing
category_features.definition: Create and manage monetary interactions between parties (ie. bills and invoices)

category_features.definition: Capture and analyze information about your customers and interactions with them

related_products.short_desc: Asset Panda's equipment rental management software automates monitoring the status and auditing your rented-out equipment.
related_products.features: Asset Panda's equipment rental management software helps organizations that rent out their equipment accurately track, manage, and monitor their assets in real-time. If you have to track your rented equipment manually, you can't conduct a comprehensive audit. Instead of manually auditing the status of your rented assets, automate the process with our cloud-based asset tracking platform online or through our free mobile iOS & Android apps. Get a free guided demo today!

related_products.short_desc: All-in-one rental software for small and medium-sized rental businesses.
related_products.features: Booqable is all-in-one rental software for small and medium-sized rental businesses. With an intuitive backend, online store, and iOS app, you'll get everything you need to accept bookings and manage your day-to-day more efficiently. Join over 2,500+ business owners who are already saving time and offering better rental experiences with Booqable. Book a personal demo or start a free trial today.

related_products.short_desc: Web based equipment rental software with mobile apps. Its the only rental solution that goes down to tracking every equipment
related_products.features: EZRentOut is the only rental software that goes down to tracking every piece of equipment. Reserve Orders, track inventory, and manage equipment rentals with a complete POS solution. We also integrate with payment gateways, and offer a user-friendly Webstore for seamless customer experience. Maximize your ROI by efficiently renting out gear and minimizing equipment downtime. Use our EZRentOut mobile app to manage rental operations on the go.

related_products.short_desc: Windward System Five is a full business management system for companies that sell, service, or rent inventory.
related_products.features: Windward System Five is a full business management system for companies that sell, service, or rent inventory. The software includes core functionality of Point of Sale, CRM, Inventory Control, and Accounting; fully integrated operating in real-time. The feature set and flexibility of our platform allow a diverse set of vertical markets such as Home Goods, Lighting Showrooms, and Rental Shops to thrive with day-to-day use of Windward System 5, whether a single location shop or a national chain.

related_products.short_desc: Flex provides web-based, customizable rental management software: inventory management, scanning, quoting, contact management and more.
related_products.features: Powerful inventory management solution for forward-thinking enterprises that need optimize their inventory tracking, sales, warehouse operations, and rentals. Flex Rental Solutions comes with powerful tools for modeling inventory the way you use it, supporting virtual items, racks, and road cases. Flex features contact management, financial management with QuickBooks TM integration, crew management, barcode scanner support, intuitive search abilities, drag-and-drop functionality & more.

related_products.short_desc: Resource management and planning software for the AV & Event industry. Schedule resources, track inventory and create and send quotes.
related_products.features: Resource management and planning software for the Audiovisual, Event & Party industries. Only pay for the products and add-ons you need. Manage your rentals and event productions in one place: schedule your crew and/or equipment, organize and track equipment or create and send quotes. Integrated CRM and tools for customer and employee communication.

related_products.short_desc: Rentle's e-commerce and store management solutions provide the tools and support for starting, managing, and growing a rental business.
related_products.features: Rentle's e-commerce and store management solutions provide the tools and support for starting, managing, and growing a rental business. With easy-to-use yet powerful functionalities, Rentle reduces your workload in the back-office while supporting your growth both online and in-store. Using Rentle is easy with any device from smartphone to desktop, adding flexibility to your work. With API and versatile integrations, Rentle connects well with your existing tool stack.

related_products.short_desc: We're the most-referred rental & inventory management software for 5,000+ businesses worldwide, constantly innovating for your success.
related_products.features: Point of Rental's founders were literal rocket scientists who worked on NASA's lunar lander. We helped put a man on the moon - and since 1982, we've been providing rental software that takes businesses to new heights. Our award-winning products are designed to handle your company's needs, no matter the size or industry. What we're best known for, however, is our customer support: with 600+ years in the rental industry, we know where you're coming from. Now, let's get you where you want to be.

related_products.short_desc: Large & small rental company software in the cloud, with powerful & unique features, improving efficiency, workflow & saving you money.
related_products.features:
We built HireHop to give the hire and rental industry powerful, fully featured, affordable and easy to use software.  
HireHop was built by people who have worked in the equipment rental industry, as well as utilising feedback from our users, people like you. This has enabled us to build the world's most fully featured, powerful and future proof cloud equipment rental software, that is perfectly tailored for large and small companies.  So start using HireHop today for FREE!

related_products.short_desc: Powerful cloud rental management software built for the equipment rental market. Accessible on any device, anytime, anywhere.
related_products.features:
Powering every step of your workflow, Current RMS is the helping hand for the equipment rental industry.

- Log key client information from general inquiries
- Create engaging proposals and orders on the go
- Send quotes & rental agreements out online for e-signature capture
- Check real-time inventory availability figures
- Allocate specific labor and transport to jobs
- Create part-invoices when taking deposits
- Scan your way through your warehouse processes

related_products.short_desc: Windows-based rental management software for party and tool rental businesses. Supports over 700 rental stores across the USA.
related_products.features: With over 40 years of experience, and thousands of satisfied users writing millions of rental contracts throughout the U.S., Canada and the Caribbean, Alert Rental Management Software provides the most comprehensive and advanced rental management software in the category. Alert has all the latest technology and software features to help you increase your sales and profits in your market specialty, whether it be heavy equipment, general tool, party, or specialty rental.

similar_products.short_desc: Quipli is a US-based maker of cloud-based software that enables independent rental companies to run their entire business online.
similar_products.features:
Quipli is a US-based maker of advanced, cloud-based software that lets independent rental companies accept customer orders and receive payments online, as well as gain unprecedented control over rental inventories, scheduling, and much more.

Features include an SEO-optimized website, virtual shopping cart, checkout functionality, robust payment gateway, electronic signature collection, proof-of-insurance upload capability, password-protected customer account management access, and much more.

similar_products.short_desc: ODT Rentals is an all-in-one, real time equipment rental management solution built in Microsoft Dynamics 365 Business Central.
similar_products.features:
ODT Rentals is a complete, centralized equipment rental management solution that includes everything you need to manage your business from anywhere. 

With accounting, inventory, and business intelligence in one place, you can easily reserve and rent units, invoice recurring rentals, track maintenance history, review equipment availability, and access real-time data. 

Automate manual processes, increase profit margins, and decrease downtime with cloud software tailored to your rental business.

similar_products.short_desc: Web based equipment rental software with mobile apps. Its the only rental solution that goes down to tracking every equipment
similar_products.features: EZRentOut is the only rental software that goes down to tracking every piece of equipment. Reserve Orders, track inventory, and manage equipment rentals with a complete POS solution. We also integrate with payment gateways, and offer a user-friendly Webstore for seamless customer experience. Maximize your ROI by efficiently renting out gear and minimizing equipment downtime. Use our EZRentOut mobile app to manage rental operations on the go.

similar_products.short_desc: Infor SyteLine Equipment Rental is an end-to-end ERP system including enterprise-class financials for equipment rental and service.
similar_products.features: Infor SyteLine Equipment Rental is a robust, end-to-end ERP system including enterprise level financials for rental and service.  Features a comprehensive suite from CRM, sales, service, rental, inventory, and financial management all wrapped in a modern, clean, simple to understand user experience. Dashboards/KPIs drive differentiation and take your business to the next level. Fully configurable to meet individual needs.  Cloud, hosted, or on-prem (10 user min).  Not for Party Rental

similar_products.short_desc: We're the most-referred rental & inventory management software for 5,000+ businesses worldwide, constantly innovating for your success.
similar_products.features: Point of Rental's founders were literal rocket scientists who worked on NASA's lunar lander. We helped put a man on the moon - and since 1982, we've been providing rental software that takes businesses to new heights. Our award-winning products are designed to handle your company's needs, no matter the size or industry. What we're best known for, however, is our customer support: with 600+ years in the rental industry, we know where you're coming from. Now, let's get you where you want to be.

similar_products.short_desc: Companies with financial, rental and service mngt. needs are engaging AcuRental to improve operations and financial performance.
similar_products.features: Equipment, event, and audio-visual rental/leasing companies are engaging AcuRental to manage business wide processes on a single dedicated Cloud based ERP platform. In addition to robust core rental processing functionality, inventory, POS, service/asset management, dealer sales, financials, project accounting, and multi-location/multi-currency are supported. Business decision making is optimized by real-time graphical dashboards personalized for executives as well as department heads.

similar_products.short_desc: Manage your rentals, sales, and service operations, all from one easy to use platform.
similar_products.features: WebbRes is a dealer management software platform for Trailer, RV, Equipment, and repair shops. Dealerships and business owners can management sales, rentals, and service operations from one easy-to-use platform.

similar_products.short_desc: Includes rental and sales transactions functions, item look-up, inventory management, accounting, customer management, and more.
similar_products.features:
FocalPoint Software will handle all operations for your rental store. FocalPoint Software is built to grow with your business and works with all types of inventory, including: homeowner items, tools, construction equipment, party supplies, event rentals and more.

FocalPoint has been in use across the United States and Canada since 2004, and our support staff is incredible.

similar_products.short_desc: Leading ERP software for equipment rental companies that helps you get more value from your equipment.
similar_products.features:
RentalMan helps you get more value out of your rental equipment. From the time you purchase to the time you sell, the platform has centralized, flexible, and robust options to help you successfully manage and scale the growth of your equipment rental business. 

Direct areas of improvement include increased utilization, improved fleet availability, increased pickups and deliveries, reduced DSO (days sales outstanding, and reduced credit memos.

similar_products.short_desc: Multinational companies with 10+ locations run this enterprise software. Now, these same tools are available to everyone.
similar_products.features:
Multinational companies with 10+ locations run this enterprise rental software. Now, these same tools are available to everyone.

Fame Rental is the only mobile-first, all-in-one, platform that integrates with anything. Manage rentals, sales, retail, service, inspections, parts, maintenance, route optimization, accounting, financials, reporting, & taxes - all on one web-based platform. 

If you want to go mobile, automate more, and go 100% paperless - this could be a fit for you.

similar_products.short_desc: NEW for 2022 - STAR-Events Rental A rental management system designed for the Special Events and Audio Visual/Staging Industries.
similar_products.features:
NEW for 2022

STAR-Events Rental is a comprehensive Special Events rental management system for medium and large enterprises. 

Built within the latest Microsoft SQL based full ERP system. Rentals, Sales, Service, Financials, Visual Inventory, CRM, Project Management and more. 

User tailored Dashboard screens help complete daily tasks. Internal notes, images, communications and Office 365 type navigation all contribute to better productivity.

similar_products.short_desc: Equipment Rental Management Software
similar_products.features:
PREXA365 is a cloud-based Equipment Rental Management System powered by Microsoft, designed to meet the needs of the Equipment Rental Industry.

This comprehensive solution will help to simplify and streamline your rental processes, delivering greater results via masterfully crafted workflows to automate processes such as Rental Contracts & Invoicing, Inventory Management, Equipment Tracking & Preventive Maintenance while lowering the expenditure and improving ROI.

similar_products.short_desc: RockSolid MAX integrated point of sale is easy to use and helps retailers grow their business at one affordable monthly price.
similar_products.features: RockSolid MAX software includes features home and building supply retailers need to grow their business at one affordable monthly price. With easy-to-use integrated point of sale, purchasing, inventory management, and accounts receivable, your business will operate efficiently and profitably.  With document management spend time with customers instead of digging through paper. Plus, its cloud-based so you can access the system from anywhere and know your data is always backed up and protected.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Equipment Maintenance software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Equipment Maintenance tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Equipment Maintenance software automates the process of managing equipment history and maintenance records. These applications help manage inbound service calls, schedule appointments, and provide dispatch and communication tools for technicians in the field. They also offer features like customer / location service histories, wireless communications integration, job location mapping tools and they integrate traditional business functions such as accounting, contract management, invoicing and customer relationship management into one convenient tool. Equipment Maintenance software is related to Building Maintenance software, Facility Management software, Field Service Management software, Mobile software and Service Dispatch software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Event Rental software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Gym Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Event Rental Software (ERS) helps party and event rental busiesses manage equipment rental for events of all types, including billing, invoicing, quoting, and inventory and order management. ERS often integrate with third-party accounting and webstore applications.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Rental software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Rental tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Rental software automates business management, record keeping, and accounting for rental businesses, including retail stores and rental property management firms. These applications enable the automation and integration of core business processes such as point of sale (POS), Customer Relationship Management (CRM), accounting and inventory management as well as customer satisfaction tools. Rental software is related to Hospitality Property Management software.

_source.short_desc: The #1 POS system for Quilt, Music, Outdoor, Scuba, and Craft shops. Manage your inventory, customers, and marketing all in one place.
_source.long_desc:
The #1 POS system for Quilt, Music, Outdoor, Scuba, and Craft shops. With Rain, your inventory is always up-to-date with what you sell online and in your store.  The easy-to-use interface allows you to manage customers, classes, equipment repairs, purchase orders, reports, calendar events, Quickbooks integration, and more.  

Rain's marketing suite will keep you in close contact with your customers through email marketing and text message marketing. 

All customers get unlimited support.
_source.target_audience: Rain specializes in niche retail markets including Music, Ski, Surf, Dive, Toy, Apparel, Quilt, Sewing, and Craft stores.  It simplifies business operations and helps increase total sales.

related_products.short_desc: Accept card and contactless payments in person with our selection of chip, tap, and swipe readers and accessories.
related_products.features:
Accept major credit and debit cards wherever you sell, send invoices, and record cash and check transactions.

Pay as you sell with no monthly fees, setup fees, cancellation fees, or processing minimums.

related_products.short_desc: Bring smarter payments & convenience to your clients with Booker's powerful POS software, built to help run your spa or salon better.
related_products.features: **EMV Ready!** Make life more convenient for you & your clients with Booker's POS software. Booker syncs up your customer profiles, secures store payment information, and tracks customer purchases over time. Booker's all-in-one platform connects your online booking with your POS and makes for a powerful solution for service-based businesses. Join over 128,000 professionals who are taking advantage of Booker's business management solution to run their business better.

related_products.short_desc: This complete software enriches businesses with its intuitive cloud-based interface, advanced sale management and built-in reports.
related_products.features: Promo: Save up to $1,000 on our retail digital bundle. Future-proof your business with Lightspeed Retail and its features like contactless payments, omnichannel loyalty & advanced eCommerce solution. Lightspeed Retail simplifies the way you serve customers and manage all your store locations. Manage your inventory, keep tabs on your sales, manage your employees, process payments and create unforgettable shopping experiences that keep customers coming back again and again all from your iPad.

related_products.short_desc: NetSuite, the world's #1 cloud ERP, gives you the visibility and control you need to make smart decisions and grow with confidence.
related_products.features: NetSuite is an all-in-one cloud business management solution that helps more than 32,000 organizations operate more effectively by automating core processes and providing real-time visibility into operational and financial performance. With a single, integrated suite of applications for managing accounting, order processing, inventory management, production, and supply chain and warehouse operations, NetSuite gives companies clear visibility of their information and control of their business.

related_products.short_desc: Designed to help any restaurant or retail outlet run efficiently. It is easy-to-use and fully integrated with other Odoo applications.
related_products.features: Odoo Point of Sale features a user-friendly, intuitive interface that any restaurant, shop, or retail company can utilize with the greatest of ease. This solution is compatible with any hardware, works online/offline, and Odoo?s integrated inventory management enables real-time control and accurate forecasting to more efficiently manage procurement. Odoo Point of Sale also helps users reward their customers with custom loyalty programs, consisting of points, gifts, and even discounts.

related_products.short_desc: CAKE POS is designed to meet the unique needs of restaurants. A simple, intuitive and cost-friendly solution.
related_products.features:
CAKE built its POS to meet the demands of Quick & Full Service restaurants. It is simple, intuitive, and cost-friendly.

Easily handle Quick Service rush hours with line-busting OrderPads that control the flow of traffic and a customer-facing display for guests to privately pay, tip, and sign from their own screen. Supercharge your Full-Service POS with rich guest profiles and automatic table status updates. CAKE POS makes it easy for restaurants to get more done every day.

related_products.short_desc: Whether you sell online or in store, Square for Retail can work for your retail business no matter your size or style.
related_products.features: Square for Retail includes all the tools you need to run your retail business. With Square for Retail you can sell in-store and online seamlessly, with an easy-to-use point of sale, integrated payments, seamless online store, advanced inventory management, and powerful reporting. Offer contactless payments and in-store pickup, and manage all your orders. Integrated with Squares powerful ecosystem so you can customize your solution with everything from invoices to email marketing. Try it free!

related_products.short_desc: An all-in-one point-of-sale & payments system, Clover integrates the functions of a cash register, card payment terminal, & POS system.
related_products.features: Clover is an all-in-one point-of-sale and payments system that integrates the functions of a cash register, card payment terminal, and POS system. As a cloud-based platform supporting a suite of devices, Clover makes it easier and faster than ever to run your business. Built-in capabilities allow you to simplify daily tasks, speed up transactions, engage customers, and accept the latest payments effortlessly. Clover also offers a robust App Market, with 300+ apps available and growing.

related_products.short_desc: TouchBistro is an all-in-one POS and restaurant management system that makes running a restaurant easier, while saving time and money.
related_products.features: TouchBistro is an all-in-one POS and restaurant management system that makes running a restaurant easier. Built to meet the unique needs of the restaurant industry, TouchBistro is fast, reliable, and easy to use, and has all of the features restaurateurs need to increase sales, deliver a great guest experience, and save both time and money. By pairing innovative restaurant technology and dedication to customer support and success, TouchBistro has powered more than 29,000 restaurants globally!

related_products.short_desc: talech is a cloud-based, iPad point-of-sale software solution for restaurants/bars, retail stores, salons/spas and other services
related_products.features: talech is a POS software designed to help restaurant, retail and service businesses simplify operations & uncover insights to make better decisions. With talech, merchants can do more than take orders and process payments. They can track inventory, customize orders, apply discounts, manage employees, and build customer relationships. With real-time reporting & analytics, merchants can run reports to understand sales trends, employee performance, and customer behavior to make informed decisions.

related_products.short_desc: Toast is an all-in-one POS and restaurant management system built to improve efficiency and dramatically cut costs.
